background: EdTech Solutions Inc. needs to deploy their containerized LMS platform that requires high availability and performance for serving educational content. The system needs to handle concurrent student access and maintain session persistence across multiple containers.
problem: Develop a CDKTF configuration to deploy a scalable Learning Management System (LMS) using ECS and ElastiCache Redis for session management and content caching in the education sector.

setup_requirements: Docker installed locally for container testing
core_components: ECS Fargate cluster for the LMS application
ElastiCache Redis cluster for session management
Application Load Balancer for traffic distribution

constraints: All resources must be deployed in ca-central-1 region with multi-AZ configuration; Redis cluster must be encrypted at rest and in transit with automatic failover enabled
